properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) LISTCOUNT FROM REPORT WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM ( SELECT B.BOARD_TITLE , RE.RCP_TITLE , REP_NO , M.MEM_ID WRITER , M_.MEM_ID TARGET , REP_REASON , REP_DATE FROM REPORT R JOIN MEMBER M ON (REP_WRITER_NO = M.USER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M_ ON (REP_TARGET_NO = M_.USER_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON (R.REP_CONTENT_NO = B.BOARD_NO) LEFT JOIN RECIPE RE ON (RE.RCP_NO = R.REP_CONTENT_NO) WHERE R.STATUS='Y' ORDER BY REP_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
